title: Design and preparation of novel antioxidant and antibacterial films containing procyanidins and phycocyanin for food packaging
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7572-7581
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08653D, Paper

Shanshan Tie, Qing Zhang, Yixuan Zhao, Ying Wu, Dasu Liu, Lina Zhao, Shaobin Gu
Novel antioxidant and antibacterial films based on carboxymethyl chitosan and pectin incorporated with procyanidins and phycocyanin were designed and fabricated for food packaging.
